import random

num_all_nodes = 128
num_stages = 3
num_nodes = [0] + sorted([random.randint(1, num_all_nodes-1) for _ in range(num_stages)]) + [num_all_nodes]
print(num_nodes)
num_nodes = [num_nodes[i] - num_nodes[i-1]  for i in range(1, len(num_nodes))]
print(num_nodes)
sum(num_nodes)

[0, 71, 86, 125, 128]
[71, 15, 39, 3]

128
